short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension filters Amazon search results by products that are sold and delivered by Amazon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make the most of your Amazon shopping experience! This extension helps you filter Amazon search results by products that are sold and delivered by Amazon. Simply enter your search query on Amazon and click the button. We'll filter the search results for you!
